org.opentcs.util.math

Class IntegerArithmetic

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.opentcs.util.math.IntegerArithmetic
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Arithmetic<java.lang.Integer>

    public final class IntegerArithmetic
extends java.lang.Object
implements Arithmetic<java.lang.Integer>
    Implements methods for mathematical operations on integer data types.

      • add

        public java.lang.Integer add(java.lang.Integer summand1,
                             java.lang.Integer summand2)
        Description copied from interface: Arithmetic
        Returns the sum of the given summands. If any of the given summands is null, it is replaced by the neutral element for additions.
